title: Why can I never get into the PBE?
body: I keep signing up over and over. Yet never get in. It very frustrating as I want to test stuff our and post about my thoughts on it. Yet I never get a chance to beta test.

replies.body: I don't have any insight on getting accepted to the PBE beyond the [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) and having an account in good standing.  I know you've waited a while, and hope you get it soon!
